content:
To follow up this discussion: https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/implementers/subject/CDS.20Hooks.2C.20'asynchr.2E'.20reply/near/92912

Reading some more topics, I found that using the redirect link from the request is also an alternative that would not obfuscate the intentions of the standard and the EHR FHIR service ...

?
